mapper.sql: REPLYID, COMMENTID, USERID, AIMUSERID, REPLYCOMMENT, ANONYMITY, ANONYMITYAIM, REPLYDATE, REPLYSTATE
mapper.insert:
insert into REPLYINFO
REPLYID,
COMMENTID,
USERID,
AIMUSERID,
REPLYCOMMENT,
ANONYMITY,
ANONYMITYAIM,
REPLYDATE,
REPLYSTATE,

mapper.update:
update REPLYINFO
COMMENTID = #{commentid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
USERID = #{userid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
AIMUSERID = #{aimuserid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REPLYCOMMENT = #{replycomment,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ANONYMITY = #{anonymity,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ANONYMITYAIM = #{anonymityaim,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REPLYDATE = #{replydate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REPLYSTATE = #{replystate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where REPLYID = #{replyid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update REPLYINFO set COMMENTID = #{commentid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, USERID = #{userid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, AIMUSERID = #{aimuserid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REPLYCOMMENT = #{replycomment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ANONYMITY = #{anonymity,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ANONYMITYAIM = #{anonymityaim,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REPLYDATE = #{replydate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REPLYSTATE = #{replystate,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where REPLYID = #{replyid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
